name: Dawn Lamp
description:
## Dawn Lamp

Light up your life and your farm with this sturdy and reliable dawn lamp that's perfect for early mornings and late nights.

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
